fulltext:
CAO THI HAI YEN 
LEGAL GENERALIST CUM PROJECT ASSISTANT TO CEO 
Phone : (0) 914 222 353 
Email : yencao214@gmail.com 
75081  
SUMMARY 
More than 2 years working in assistant roles to CEO, Directors and Managers of various levels and 1 year working in Human 
Resources services in multiple major corporations. Strong work ethics and capability to work well under pressure. Result-
oriented and solution-focused to challenges. Hardworking with a strong desire to learn and a positive attitude toward 
challenges. Capable of working independently and multitasking. Strong commitment toward set deadline under changing 
priorities. 
Personal philosophy: “One third of our lives is spent at work. Contribution and dedication to the workplace is, therefore, a 
necessary endeavor to increase our personal happiness.” 
SKILLS 
Strong interpersonal 
communication and conflict 
management skills; 
Good observational and data 
analytical skills; 
Adaptable to dynamic working 
environment; 
Capable of taking on multiple roles 
simultaneously; 
Fluent in conversational English. 
EDUCATION 
POST-EDUCATION IN 
ENGLISH 
APR 2018 – SEP 2018 
CELLA ENGLISH, PHILLIPINES 
GRADUATE IN 
INTERNATIONAL LAW  
APR 2011 - SEP 2015 
HCM UNIVERSITY OF LAW, 
VIETNAM 
Major : International Law and Legal 
Studies 
EXPERIENCE 
ASSISTANT TO PERFORMANCE & PLANNING MANAGER 
SEP 2017 – APR 2018 | Anheuser-Busch InBev Vietnam, HCMC 
Administrate on behalf of both Regional Performance and Planning 
Management (R-PPM) and Regional Sales Manager (RSM) in South East, 
Vietnam, in details as below: 

Enforce payments in time for around 100 Points of Consumptions (POCs) and 
rebates for Distributors by checking performances of POCs and terms of 
conditions of investments, and giving solutions for stuck payments; 

Prepare Daily/Monthly/and Quarterly Sales Reports in 6 Provinces with 7 
Distributors; 

Evaluate performance of Sales Team including 4 Sales Supervisors and 12 Sales 
Representatives and performance of Distributors by building tracking systems; 

Decrease customer turnover rate by 30%, making it 5% after 2 months as a 
result; 

Support releasing Free of charge (FOC) in process by examining data and 
collating claims. submitted by Sales Team with Promotion built by Trade 
LEGAL GENERALIST CUM PROJECT ASSISTANT TO CEO 
OCT 2018 – PRESENT| Komtek Corporation, HCMC 

Process legal documentations for share transfer, dissolution, and other daily 
legal operations required by the company; 

Liaise with our international partners to conduct business with local customers; 

Work with local customers to determine their expectations of the 
products/services of international partners and consequently revise the proposals 
and make suitable offers to them; 

Negotiate with both international and local partners; 

Draft/Review all international and local contracts; 

Revise the contract template to be up-to-date and compliant with current legal 
and regulatory requirements; 

Give CEO updates on managed projects and provide advices on specific terms 
in project contracts which should be amended; 

Set up meetings for 2-way and 3-way meetings between CEO, international 
partners and local customers;  
Marketing Team;

ASSISTANT TO SALES DIRECTOR 
APR 2016 - SEP 2017 | TARA Corporation, HCMC 

Assist Sales Director in preparing KPIs for Sales Department;  

Assist Sales Director in building Regional Sales Budget by analyzing 
investment impact in 7 areas in Traditional Trade channel; 

Draft incentive policy for 10 Distributors in Modern Trade channel to boost 
theirs performances; 

Evaluate nationwide sales progress of over 150 people including Promotion 
Girls (PGs), Sale Representatives, PG Team Leaders, Sales Supervisors, Area 
Sales Managers and Regional Sales Managers - in both Traditional Trade and 
Modern Trade channels; 

Perform secretary duties in weekly and monthly meetings. Replying on that, 
request strictly compliance from Sales Team by tracking progress, deadlines, 
and priorities of all current Sales Programs; 

Check nationwide sales proposals before getting approvals from Sales Director 
and CEO; 

Compose, review and revise and organized B2B & partnership contracts.
